section.name: Welcome
section.p: Tag Library Documentation Generator is a utility for automatically generating javadoc-style documentation for JavaServer PagesTM (JSPTM) Technology Tag Libraries. It accepts a set of tag libraries as input, and generates a set of HTML files as output. It can also be used to generate tag library documentation for JavaServer Faces UI components.
Included in the output is a full description of each defined tag library, the tags contained within those tag libraries, and how to use those tags.
